    Alle Klassen und Schnittstellen

    Klassen
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    Address
    The Address class represents an address consisting of street, house number, postal code, city and country.
    Book
    The Book class represents a book consisting of ID, title, author, genre, isDamaged, isBorrowed, personBorrowed, borrowDate, feeForOneWeek and feeForDamagedBook.
    BookFilter
    The BookFilter class defines filter criteria for searching books in a library system based on title, author and genre.
    LibrarySystem
    The LibrarySystem class manages books, people, and book lending in a library.
    Main
     
    Person
    The Person class represents a person consisting of ID, first name, last name, birthdate, address, borrowed books and open fees.
    PersonFilter
    The PersonFilter class defines filter criteria for searching people in a library system based on borrowed books, outstanding fees, and the number of borrowed books.
